__e: Some happiness is better than a lifetime of anything else.
You know when you work all day you come home, you want things to be just good and happy and... Have it be right.
You have everything, and it's not because you're a good little girl who deserves happiness. It's because you stole mine.
Our life together has brought me more joy Than a man like me thought he could ever know.
My daughter's happiness is all that ever mattered to me.

I know that your happiness Is one of the most important things in the world to me...

There is no man in this world has ever known the happiness you have brought me, Bella.

The happiness you feel is something that you never want away, ever.
Yeah. But your happiness is no small thing to me.
